\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G0846"\w* \w alive|strong="G2198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3748"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G2300"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w did|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G0569"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w appeared|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* shape \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w walking|strong="G4043"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G3778"\w* \w going|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w country|strong="G0068"\w*.

\w And|strong="G0565"\w* \w they|strong="G2548"\w* \w going|strong="G0565"\w* \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w it|strong="G1565"\w* \w to|strong="G0518"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w rest|strong="G3062"\w*: \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w did|strong="G3761"\w* \w they|strong="G2548"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w them|strong="G1565"\w*.

\w At|strong="G1161"\w* length \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w appeared|strong="G5319"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1161"\w* table: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* upbraided \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* incredulity \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hardness|strong="G4641"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w heart|strong="G4641"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* did \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G3748"\w* \w seen|strong="G2300"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w again|strong="G1453"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Go|strong="G4198"\w* ye \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w creature|strong="G2937"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w was|strong="G2424"\w* \w taken|strong="G0353"\w* \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sitteth \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.
